scripts.build: node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true core/static/css/styles.scss core/static/css/styles.css
scripts.watch: node-sass --include-path node_modules --output-style compressed --source-map true --source-map-contents true core/static/css/styles.scss core/static/css/styles.css --watch
